name: ATOM FORGE
description:
LUDUM DARE 49 ENTRY FOR ATOME FORGE LINK THE GAME

Atom Forge is a point-n-click rythmic game in which you use your mouse to move around the atoms along the track by activating the atom enhancer and avoid the atoms touching each other! If the machine is too unstable,a black hole will awake !

Try your best to make the atom core grow !

STORY

The year is 20XX, technology has evolved. Maybe a bit too much. Some mad governments have tried to use anti-matter and black hole as an energy source and lethal weapon. Pap U, a peace organization, found a way to stop the cycle by creating an atom core big enough that it will absorb any black hole-inducing atoms, thus stopping the antimatter race once and for all.

You play as Peace Activist Takanaka. You have infiltrated one of the antimatter forge and managed to corrupt it to create the atom core. Your goal is now to make it big enough to save the world from human madness. Be careful, a single mistake will create a black hole and promptly end the world…

TEAM:

CONTROLS
  • Left-click Mouse to click
  • Hold Left-click Mouse to grab
